original_text:
when my steps were washed with butter,
    and the rock poured out for me streams of oil!
korean_text: 젖으로 내 발자취를 씻으며 바위가 나를 위하여 기름 시내를 쏟아냈으며

sentences.original_text: when my steps were washed with butter
and the rock poured out for me streams of oil!
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 바위가 나를 위해 기름 시냇물을 쏟아냈습니다!
